title: Mouse sensitivity problems
body:
Hello,
Every time the loading screen comes up my mouse sensitivity drops down drastically. I have to keep the mouse settings window open to readjust it at the beginning of every game. It's pretty frustrating.

replies.body:
Once you start loading into a match, League adjusts your Windows mouse sensitivity to match what your settings are in-game. If you match these two sensitivity levels, you should notice no change.

Let me know if you have any questions.
